what: Simple Features for Dominican Republic Administrative Boundaries
title: Simple Features for Dominican Republic Administrative Boundaries
text: goal sfDR provide comprehensive suite simple feature (sf) objects administrative boundaries Dominican Republic, facilitating geospatial analysis mapping.

title: Simple Features for Dominican Republic Administrative Boundaries
text: can install development version sfDR r-universe :
code: if (!require('sfDR')) install.packages('sfDR', repos = c('https://adatar-do.r-universe.dev')) if (!require('dplyr')) install.packages('dplyr') if (!require('ggplot2')) install.packages('ggplot2')

title: Simple Features for Dominican Republic Administrative Boundaries
text: basic example showing use sfDR plot Dominican Republic province map:  Suppose dataset showing percentage distribution remittances received province Dominican Republic specific year. visualize data using graph sfDR, first need combine metadata simple features. original simple features dataset includes PROV_ID variable. Additional variables incorporated dr_province object. ’s important note non-ASCII characters can become corrupted stored package, may affect merging data sets. recommend cleaning errors performing merge. soon release another package functions designed facilitate process.  get desired graph, just apply plot function data. Next, show achieve similar result using ggplot2. serves demonstrate create maps libraries highlight simplicity process integrating everything one step.
code: library(sfDR) library(dplyr)  DR_PROV_SF <- sf::st_as_sf(DR_PROV)  plot(DR_PROV_SF) DR_PROV_SF <- DR_PROV_SF |>   left_join(dr_province, by = join_by(PROV_ID))  DR_PROV_SF %>% title: Simple features for the
text: dataset contains simple features polygons representing 393 municipal districts Dominican Republic, defined División Territorial 2021.

title: Simple features for the
text: simple features collection 393 features 2 fields: DM_ID Municipal district number (6 digits) based División Territorial 2021 order geometry Polygon geometry representing municipal district

title: Metadata for the
text: dataset contains metadata 393 municipal districts Dominican Republic defined División Territorial 2021. Due historical name changes, municipal districts may duplicate IDs. Users aware analyzing data.

title: Metadata for the
text: data frame 393 rows 3 variables: DM_ID Municipal district number (6 digits) based División Territorial 2021 order DM_NAME Full name municipal district defined División Territorial 2021

title: Metadata for the
text: https://www.one.gob./publicaciones/2021/division-territorial-2021/

title: Metadata for the
text: dataset contains metadata 158 municipalities Dominican Republic defined División Territorial 2021. Note due historical name changes, municipalities may duplicate IDs. Users consider working data.

title: Metadata for the
text: data frame 158 rows 3 variables: MUN_ID Municipality number (3 digits) based División Territorial 2021 order MUN_NAME Full name municipality defined División Territorial 2021

title: Metadata for the
text: https://www.one.gob./publicaciones/2021/division-territorial-2021/

title: Metadata for the
text: dataset contains metadata 32 provinces Dominican Republic defined División Territorial 2021. Note provinces undergone name changes time, leading potential duplicates province IDs. Users aware analyzing data.

title: Metadata for the
text: data frame 32 rows 3 variables: PROV_ID Province number (2 digits) based División Territorial 2021 order PROV_NAME Full name province defined División Territorial 2021 PROV_CODE Province code, custom 2 3-letter abbreviation created province

title: Metadata for the
text: https://www.one.gob./publicaciones/2021/division-territorial-2021/

text: dataset contains metadata development regions Dominican Republic. regions correspond 10 development regions defined Decreto 710-04.
